fields.Title: Ana Kavcic Pucihar - Fulbright 2014-2015
fields.Description/Abstract:
As a Fulbright Scholar, Slovenian teacher and flutist Ana Kavcic Pucihar will continue to expand her research interests in the area of teaching and learning in music education, for the experience will provide her unique opportunities for scholarly collaboration, access to essential research materials, and the completion of course work that builds on her existing expertise.   While on Fulbright, she will complete a book project on the American-English edition of her Slovenian flute method textbook Igramo se flavto  in collaboration with Dr. Nicole Molumby.  Dr. Molumby and Ms. Pucihar will also develop a mobile application for instructors and students to use with the book.  

Application was submitted 6/6/13
Interview at US Embassy in Slovenia 9/25/13
 Selected as alternate candidate on the list 2014/2015 Fulbright grants from Slovenia 1/9/14


Role:  Co-Principal
